title: Ep. 13 - 55 Million Dollar Dreams
description:
On today's show, the guys discuss what they're going to do when they win the Mega Millions, UFO whistleblowers being killed and whether or not Elon Musk is actually an alien, Bunny Ranch owner Dennis Hof passing away and how he affected some of the guys' lives, decide which event they could beat the devil at if their soul was up for grabs, and how some Americans think chocolate milk comes from brown cows. Todd also wants to know which movies the guys would change the ending to and what the new ending would be. The also answer some listener questions, and send you into the weekend with some Friday Bangerz. Come and have a good time with us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
